title: Origin: Number 5 of the Robert Langdon Series

title: Tell Tale
description: Find out what happens to the hapless young detective from Naples who travels to an Italian hillside town to find out Who Killed the Mayor? and the pretentious schoolboy in A Road to Damascus, whose discovery of the origins of his fatherâ€™s wealth changes his life in the most profound way.

title: Hit Refresh
description: Microsoft's CEO tells the inside story of the company's continuing transformation, tracing his own personal journey from a childhood in India to leading some of the most significant technological changes in the digital era.
author: Satya Nadella
